card.name: Waterfall Mongrel
card.text: Cascade Whenever Waterfall Mongrel or another creature enters under your control, put a charge counter on Waterfall Mongrel. {t}, remove X charge counters from Waterfall Mongrel: Discover X.

card.name: Greedy Trapper
card.text: {w}{r}, {t}: Exile target creature until Greedy Trapper leaves the battlefield. When Greedy Trapper dies, it deal damage to all permanents equal to the total mana cost of creatures exiled with it.

card.name: Oversee
card.text: Scry 2 for target player, then scry 2.

card.name: Privacy Cop
card.text: Vigilance Whenever a player searches, scries for, or reorders a deck or hand that isnâ€™t theirs, put a +1/+1 counter on Privacy Cop. {1}, {t}: Scry 1 for target player.

card.name: Send High
card.text: Flash When Send High enters, put X time counters on it and exile target permanent you control with converted mana cost less than or equal to X. At the beginning of your end step, remove a time counter from Send High. When Send High has no time counters on it, sacrifice it and return the exiled permanent to the battlefield under your control. Then it deals damage to any target equal to its mana cost.

card.name: Encouragement
card.text: Flicker each creature you control with backup.

card.name: Overrun
card.text: Spells you control have trample. Horde 3 - creatures you control have trample.

card.name: Active Duty Bonus
card.text: Tap up to two target permanents target opponent controls. Make a treasure for each tapped creature they control.

card.name: Soul Sister
card.text: Lifelink As Soul Sister enters, you may attach up to one creature with bestow to it from your hand.

card.name: Cannibalistic Ritual
card.text: You may sacrifice a creature or two Foods rather than pay this spell's mana cost. Target creature gets +3/+3, gains trample and hexproof, and loses flying and first strike until end of turn.

card.name: Hunger for Magic
card.text: Sacrifice an enchantment: make a Food token.

card.name: Tap-Dancing Heron
card.text: Flying Whenever a spell or ability you control would tap X creatures, you may give this creature +X/+X until end of turn instead.

card.name: Spirit Spear
card.text: Destroy target enchantment. Horde 2 - target creature you control gains protection from a color of the targeted enchantment or colorless if it has no color.

card.name: Carrion Bird
card.text: Flying Carrion Bird gets +X/+0, where X is the number of Birds in your graveyard.

card.name: Incendiary Canary
card.text: Flying Backup {1}, {t}, sacrifice this creature: it deals damage equal to its converted mana cost to target creature.

card.name: Devoted Bombardier
card.text: When Devoted Bombardier enters the battlefield, it deals damage equal to your devotion to red equal to target creature. This damage cannot be prevented.

card.name: Priest of the Corals
card.text: {u}, {t}: Scry 1. If your devotion to blue is at least 3, scry 3 instead. {g}, {t}: Target creature you control gets +1/+1 until end of turn. If your devotion to green is at least 3, it also gains reach and trample.

card.name: False Devotion
card.text: Until the end of your next end step, any time your devotion to anything is checked, it is considered 3 greater. (If something checks for devotion to two things, this bonus only applies to one of them.)

card.name: Tumor Priest
card.text: Backup As this creature dies, if your devotion to black is at least 4, put a +1/+1 counter on target creature you control.

card.name: Cardboard Enthusiast
card.text: When Cardboard Enthusiast enters the battlefield, create a colorless 1/1 construct creature token.

card.name: Treacherous Tree Spirit
card.text: Haste When Treacherous Tree Spirit enters the battlefield, gain X life and put X charge counters on it, where X is your devotion to green. When Treacherous Tree Spirit leaves the battlefield, if your devotion to green is less than the number of charge counters on it, you lose life equal to the difference.

card.name: Rolling Waves
card.text: Return up to X target creatures to their owners' hands, where X is your devotion to blue.

card.name: Sea Horde
card.text: Sea Horde costs X less to cast, where X is your devotion to blue. Sea Horde's power and toughness are each equal to your devotion to blue. Sea Horde has trample as long as your devotion to blue is at least 4.

card.name: Holy Sniper
card.text: Equip {3} Equipped creature has, "{t}: deal X damage to target creature, where X is your devotion to white and black."

card.name: Curse of Louis
card.text: Whenever a creature enters the battlefield, if it was cast, exile it from the battlefield and then return it to the battlefield under its owner's control.

card.name: Speed Demon
card.text: Haste As long as your devotion to blue and red is less than 4, Speed Demon isn't a creature. You may cast sorcery spells as though they have flash.

card.name: Oozing Oozer
card.text: Whenever Oozing Oozer deals combat damage to a player, make a tapped green Ooze token whose power and toughness are equal to the number of Oozes you control. Landfall - Oozing Oozer gains deathtouch until end of turn.

card.name: Abuse Momentum
card.text: Until end of turn, whenever target creature receives combat damage greater than its toughness, it deals that much damage to target creature, planeswalker, or battle.

card.name: Terra-Reformist
card.text: Whenever Terra-Reformist attacks, you may pay {r}. If you do, search your library for a basic land and put it onto the battlefield tapped.

card.name: Juju Farmer
card.text: {t}: Add one mana of a color of a permanent you control.

card.name: Fragment Horde
card.text: Whenever Fragment Horde attacks, make a token that's a copy of it tapped and attacking (the copy counts towards your devotion) except it doesn't have this ability. When Fragment Horde dies, gain X life and tap up to X permanents, where X to your devotion to white.

card.name: Volcanic Horde
card.text: Trample Horde 3 - creatures you control have, "When this creature deals combat damage to a player, its controller adds {r} mana equal to their devotion to red." When Volcanic Horde leaves the battlefield, it deals damage to all creatures equal to your devotion to red.

card.name: Divine Bullhorn
card.text: Equip {3} Horde 3 - Whenever equipped creature attacks, Cascade X, where X is your devotion to green.

card.name: Illusory Forces
card.text: Creatures you control with Horde abilities require 1 less creature to activate them. (The Horde requirement can't be below 1.)

card.name: Unruly Uprising
card.text: Creature you control get +2/+2 and trample until end of turn. If life was paid to cast this spell, they get +2/+0 and trample instead.

card.name: Afterlife Leech
card.text: Bestow {2}{b/g}{u/g} Lifelink Enchanted creature gets +1/+1 and has lifelink. At the beginning of your end step, if Afterlife Leech is attached to a creature, place a -1/-1 counter on it and a +1/+1 counter on Afterlife Leech.

card.name: Augmented Oracle
card.text: {t}: Scry 1 for target player or deal 1 damage to target creature. Whenever a creature you control becomes modified, you may untap Augmented Oracle.

card.name: Floral Fling
card.text: As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a creature. Floral Fling deals damage equal to its power to any target. If its power was 3 or less, proliferate.

card.name: Fortify
card.text: Create 2 colorless 0/3 Boulder artifact creature tokens with defender.

card.name: Stone-Tosser Golem
card.text: Reach When Stone-Tosser Golem enters or whenever you sacrifice a land, create a colorless 0/3 Boulder artifact creature token with defender. You may exert Stone-Tosser Golem as it attacks. When you do, you may sacrifice an artifact you control. If you do, Stone-Tosser Golem deals damage equal to the larger of the sacrificed permanent's toughness and converted mana cost to target creature, planeswalker, or battle.

card.name: Strength of the Age
card.text: Convoke For each two creatures that convoked this spell, make a 1/1 white Soldier creature token with haste. Creatures you control get +X/+X until end of turn, where X is the number of cards named Strength of the Age in all graveyards plus one.

card.name: Monument to Chigerous
card.text: At the end of your combat step, for each creature that could have attacked a permanent or player but did not, put a charge counter on Monument to Chigerous. Remove charge counters: - 4: Permanents you control gain indestructible and hexproof until end of turn. You gain 1 life. - 6: Put a 1/1 white and black soldier creature token on the battlefield with, "at the end of your combat step, if this creature could have attacked a permanent or player but did not, put a +1/+1 counter on it. - 20, sacrifice Monument to Chigerous: deal 20 damage distributed among any number of target permanents.

card.name: Pie-Thrower Runt
card.text: {t}, sacrifice a token: Pie-Thrower Runt deals 2 damage to any target. If the token was a Food, gain 1 life.

card.name: Well-Travelled Alpakon
card.text: Backup This creature gets +1/+1 so long as you control at least 2 basic lands with different types.

card.name: Simple Alpakon

card.name: Mother Alpakon

card.name: Frozen Dragon
card.text: Ward {1} Frozen Dragon enters tapped with a stun counter on it if it was cast. Whenever Frozen Dragon attacks, you may place up to 3 stun counters in any way on up to 3 target permanents. Islands you control have "{1}, {t}: tap target permanent."

card.name: Frozen Dragon's Eye
card.text: Until end of turn, whenever you scry one or more, you may tap or untap that many target creatures.

card.name: Regrets Take Flight
card.text: Convoke Target player mills 4 cards. Then place 4 -1/-1 counters on target creature they control.

card.name: Mossroamer

card.name: Regrowl
card.text: Bestow {2}{w/g}{b/g} When Regrowl enters, if it is attached to a creature, you may return target creature that shares a color with enchanted creature from your graveyard under your control. If you do, you lose life equal to its mana cost. Enchanted creature has first strike. First strike

card.name: Viss, the Dauntless
card.text: Flash, Backup Persist, First Strike

card.name: Dream Reacher
card.text: You may Cascade, Scry, Explore, and Surveil with any player's library whenever you would your own. For each instance of an ability that you treat this way, place a time counter on Dream Reacher. Then if it has 7 or more time counters on it, sacrifice Dream Reacher and each player shuffles their graveyards and all cards they own in exile into their library.

card.name: Dreamwalker
card.text: When Dreamwalker enters, scry 1 for target player. You may look at the top card of any library at any time.

card.name: Call Out
card.text: Choose a color or colorless. Target player reveals the top card of their library. If it was the chosen color (or indeed colorless), draw a card. You may draw another card. If you do, that player draws a card.

card.name: Flicker Bolt
card.text: Flicker Bolt deals 2 damage to target creature and flickers another target creature.

card.name: Spontaneous Bet
card.text: Target creature you control deals damage equal to its power to another target creature. If you control both creatures, create Treasures equal to the greater mana cost of the two.

card.name: Battlefield Confusion
card.text: Each creature deals 1 damage to its controller and 1 damage to itself.

card.name: Bo, Bowtie Bowmaster
card.text: This spell costs {1} less to cast for each tapped nonland permanent you control. Landfall - Tap target permanent, then untap target permanent. Whenever you tap one or more creature as a cost for an activated ability, add {1}. Untap Bo, tap 3 creatures you control: draw a card.

card.name: End of Exam
card.text: Split Second All creatures have haste. Until end of turn, whenever a creature deals combat damage to a player, its controller may draw a card then discard a card. Horde 3 - The first time a creature you control deals combat damage to a player this turn, you may draw a card.

card.name: Birdcrank
card.text: Tap a creature you control with power 3 or less: add {b}. Until end of turn, your devotion to black is considered 1 greater. Sacrifice a creature, {t}: If your devotion to black is 10 or greater, tap all permanents target opponent controls.

card.name: Earned Wings
card.text: Up to X target creatures gain flying until end of turn, where X is your devotion to blue.

card.name: Revel in Might
card.text: Revel in Might costs X less to cast, where X is the greatest power among creatures you control. Target creature you control gains trample and +X/+0 until end of turn, and then fights up to two target creatures you don't control (simultaneously, as if they both blocked it).

card.name: Diminishing Voices
card.text: Target creature gets -2/-2 until end of turn. Horde 5 - target creature gets -5/-5 until end of turn instead.

card.name: Unwilling Prodigy
card.text: Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell, you may copy that spell and choose new targets for the copy. If you do, you may return Unwilling Prodigy to its owner's hand. If you don't, put a -1/-1 counter on it.

card.name: Deconstructor Agent
card.text: Duck - deal the next 3 damage that would be dealt to Deconstructor Agent this turn to the creature it's ducking behind. Deconstructor Agent cannot be blocked by creatures with greater power. Whenever Deconstructor Agent deals combat damage to a player, destroy target artifact that player controls.

card.name: Skitterjill
card.text: Duck - deal the next 1 damage that would be dealt to Skitterjill this turn to the creature it's ducking behind. Whenever a creature you control ducks, you gain 1 life.

card.name: Razing Wind
card.text: Tap all artifacts and return any number of creatures with combined mana value 4 or less to their owners' hands. Then Razing Wind deals 2 damage to all creatures.

card.text: Duck - Burrowing Moledon gains hexproof until end of turn. First Strike {t}: Make a colorless 0/3 Boulder artifact creature token with defender.

card.name: Composted Farmer

card.name: Crankenstein

card.name: Impression of Greed
